definition: to move (to a superior place)/promotion
surname Qiao
tall
to move/to shift/to change (a position or location etc)/to promote
congratulations on house-moving or promotion (idiom); Best wishes for your new home!

sentences.english: But have you ever heard that the students had holiday because the schoolmaster moved to new house?
sentences.chinese: 但是你聽說過因爲校長喬遷新居所以學生放假嗎？

sentences.english: This is the second such event I attended during my six months in London.
sentences.chinese: 這是我到任半年以來第二次出席中資機構的喬遷儀式。

sentences.english: If they meet her standards, mating will follow.
sentences.chinese: 如果標準契合，配偶即喬遷而來。

sentences.english: Miranda just moved to a new house, let's go and celebrate with her.
sentences.chinese: 米蘭達剛搬新家了，我們祝賀他喬遷之喜吧。

sentences.english: Buy house warming gifts for new neighbors.
sentences.chinese: 爲新鄰居喬遷之喜買禮物。

sentences.english: She'll probably want to send us a housewarming gift.
sentences.chinese: 她興許想送我們一件喬遷禮物呢。

sentences.english: In modern times Chinese people set off fireworks on celebrations such as a wedding or moving to a new home.
sentences.chinese: 現代人在喜慶時也放煙花，如婚禮和喬遷新居。

sentences.english: On the move soon to be home to the attention of what?
sentences.chinese: 喬遷在即新家入住應注意哪些問題？

sentences.english: We were really living it up at John's housewarming party last night.
sentences.chinese: 喬遷之喜的晚會上，我們玩得很痛快。

sentences.english: In the first evening when Jack moved in Lily held a private ceremony to celebrate his moving to a better place.
sentences.chinese: 喬遷後的第一個晚上，莉莉主持了一個慶祝活動。

sentences.english: The next day was appointed for the removal of the new-married couple.
sentences.chinese: 第二天定爲這對新婚夫婦喬遷的日子。

sentences.english: Moving is one of the few big occasions in life.
sentences.chinese: 喬遷是人生中數得上的幾個重大場合之一。

sentences.english: About the time the family moved into their new home. Twain’s health improved dramatically.
sentences.chinese: 也就在全家喬遷新居時，吐溫的身體戲劇般地好轉了。

sentences.english: Best wishes for your new home, came to congratulate the people sitting for desk.
sentences.chinese: 喬遷之喜，前來恭賀的人坐了幾十桌。

sentences.english: They had a house-warming party as soon as they moved in.
sentences.chinese: 他們搬進新屋後很快就會舉辦喬遷派對。
瑞吉兒家今晚正在舉行喬遷慶宴。

definition: variant of 宏圖|宏图[hong2 tu2]
Xiangcheng district of Suzhou city 蘇州市|苏州市[Su1 zhou1 shi4], Jiangsu
protocol/official etiquette
Neipu township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
New Age (movement)
new era/new epoch
press conference
Chunri or Chunjih township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
Huatan township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
Penghu county (Pescadores Islands), Taiwan
Wanluan township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
executive committee
golden years (after the age of about 60)
Shihtzu township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
elementary school (Tw)
Dounan or Tounan town in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan
moviedom/the world of movies/film circles
